title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Can I Keep The Gun?"
description: Allie Boy fought a police officer and left him with nothing but his handcuffs. Hear Sammy's take on the story and how he helped his goombata get out of this sticky situation completely unscathed
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Allie Boy fought a police officer and left him with nothing but his handcuffs. Hear Sammy's take on the story and how he helped his goombata get out of this sticky situation completely unscathed
